farmcity.controller

Class ManageFriendController

  • java.lang.Object
    • farmcity.controller.ManageFriendController

  • public class ManageFriendController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages harvest crop, plant crop functions as well as player's process of leveling up

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManageFriendController()
      This method initialises the friendDAO and playerDAO

      • requestFriend

        public void requestFriend(Player player,
                          java.lang.String requestUsername)
                   throws CityException
        This method sends a friend requst to the requested username
        Parameters:
        requestUsername - Username of the current player
        player - The current Player
        Throws:
        CityException - if the player is sending a request to someone who is already on his friendlist OR if the player OR if the file to be saved to cannot be found.

      • unfriend

        public void unfriend(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String friendUsername)
              throws CityException
        This method deletes a friend from the current player's friendlist and at the same time delete the current player's name from that specific friend's friendlist
        Parameters:
        username - username of the current player
        friendUsername - username of the friend to be deleted
        Throws:
        CityException - If there are problems in accessing the data file, throws CityException

      • acceptFriend

        public void acceptFriend(Player player,
                         java.lang.String friendUsername)
                  throws CityException
        This method accepts a friend request from the current player's friendlist and at the same time adds the current player's name to that specific friend's friendlist
        Parameters:
        player - Player object of the current player
        friendUsername - username of the friend to be added
        Throws:
        CityException - If there are problems in accessing the data file, throws CityException

      • rejectFriend

        public void rejectFriend(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String friendUsername)
                  throws CityException
        This method rejects a friend request from the current player's requestlist
        Parameters:
        username - username of the current player
        friendUsername - username of the friend to be added
        Throws:
        CityException - If there are problems in accessing the data file, throws CityException
